alert.note: Alert for Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:35PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Aransas, northeastern San Patricio and southwestern Refugio Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 434 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Quintana, or 8 miles east of Refugio, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Refugio, Woodsboro, Bayside, Quintana and Bonnie View. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 near mile marker 668. US Highway 77 between mile markers 612 and 642. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Refugio; Inland San Patricio
